required.name: SPLIT_NAME
required.description: A name of a subset we want to use. This name is used to index the dataset object created from load_dataset to retrieve a specific subset of its data

required.name: INPUT_FEATURE_NAME
required.description: A name of a feature/attribute we want to use as an input to the model. This name is used to index the subset of data to retrieve a specific feature obtained from each datapoint in the subset

required.name: LABEL_FEATURE_NAME
required.description: A name of a feature/attribute we want to use as an ground truth label to compare predictions to. This name is used to index the subset of data to retrieve a specific feature obtained from each datapoint in the subset

optional.name: NUM_DATAPOINTS_TO_CLASSIFY
optional.description: Number of datapoints we want to apply the classification task to. If not specified, we classify the entire subset of data

optional.name: BATCH_SIZE
optional.description: Size of a batch that is used to compute classification in parallel. Default value: 8

optional.name: HF_MODEL
optional.description: A name of the HuggingFace model we wish to use instead of the one chosen via AIoD.
